item.title: 尽管政府大力推动，日本生育率仍创新低
item.description: 2024 年，日本的生育率连续第九年下降，再创历史新低，这凸显了日本政府在试图扭转世界上老龄化最严重的社会之一的生育趋势时所面临的巨大挑战。【原文：Japan’s fertility rate declined in 2024 for the ninth consecutive year, reaching another historical low that underscores the immense challenge facing the government as it attempts to reverse the trend in one of the world’s most aged societies.】

item.title: 人工智能新贵 Manus 启动文本到视频服务，与 OpenAI 抗衡
item.description: Manus 推出了文字视频生成功能，进入了一个竞争激烈的领域，竞争对手包括 OpenAI、中国的阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和腾讯控股有限公司。【原文：Manus unveiled a text-to-video generation feature, entering a competitive segment populated by rivals from OpenAI to China’s Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Tencent Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 贸易专家称特朗普和习近平在稀土问题上有分歧
item.description: 一位关键矿产政策专家表示，美国和中国似乎对上个月在日内瓦举行的稀土贸易谈判上达成的协议有不同的理解。【原文：The US and China appear to have different understandings of what was agreed on rare earths at last month’s trade talks in Geneva, according to an expert on critical minerals policy.】

item.title: 新西兰全黑橄榄球队签约 Gallagher 保险公司为赞助商
item.description: 新西兰橄榄球队（New Zealand Rugby）与盖拉格保险公司（Gallagher Insurance）达成赞助协议，盖拉格保险公司将获得全黑橄榄球队比赛服的冠名权。【原文：New Zealand Rugby agreed a sponsorship deal with Gallagher Insurance that will give the US-based insurance brokerage naming rights on the playing kit of the All Blacks rugby team.】

item.title: 香港股市出现多年来最激动人心的行情
item.description: 香港的股票资本市场出现了数年来最活跃的时期，数十亿美元的交易提振了市场情绪，并激发了人们对未来更多交易的期待。【原文：Hong Kong’s equity capital markets are seeing the most action in years, with multibillion dollar deals lifting the mood and fueling anticipation about more deals to come.】

item.title: 韩国总统李在镕就任伊始誓言解决经济问题
item.description: 韩国新当选总统李在明就职时承诺，将重振受关税打击的韩国经济，并寻求与朝鲜对话，以缓和朝鲜半岛的紧张局势。【原文：South Korea’s newly elected President Lee Jae-myung took office with a pledge to revive the nation’s tariff-hit economy and seek dialogue with North Korea to diffuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula.】

item.title: 拉加德的欧洲央行未来在世界经济论坛的职位猜测之后备受关注
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）即将就其继续领导欧洲中央银行的承诺接受审查，尤其是在她即将达到 "几乎控制住了通货膨胀 "这一里程碑的时候。【原文：Christine Lagarde is about to face scrutiny on her commitment to keep leading the European Central Bank, not least as she nears the milestone of having just about tamed inflation.】

item.title: 波兰将维持利率不变，关注格拉平斯基的态度
item.description: 波兰将继续维持利率不变，投资者将重点关注央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）在关键的总统选举之后对借贷成本的展望。【原文：Poland is set to keep interest rates on hold, with investors focusing on central bank Governor Adam Glapinski’s outlook for borrowing costs following a pivotal presidential election.】

item.title: 市场等待习近平与特朗普通话，中国债券期货交易减少
item.description: 由于与美国的关税争端持续不断，交易商暂缓在市场上下注，中国长期主权债券期货的交易正在降温。【原文：Transactions in China’s long-term sovereign bond futures are cooling as traders hold off making bets in the market given continued tariff disputes with the US.】

item.title: 越南下令采取行动避免电力紧张，因为高温提升了需求
item.description: 越南总理范明正下令政府机构确保为家庭和企业提供不间断的电力供应，因为热浪使电力需求达到创纪录的水平。【原文：Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh has ordered government agencies to ensure uninterrupted power supplies for households and businesses as heat waves boost electricity demand to a record.】

item.title: 伊朗输往中国的石油数量因制裁和炼油厂检修而减少
item.description: 随着制裁的加强，欧佩克产油国的石油运输受阻，世界最大的化石燃料进口国炼油厂的需求下降，伊朗运往中国的石油正在减少。【原文：Iran is shipping less oil to China, as toughening sanctions snarl the OPEC producer’s shipments and refinery demand falls in the world’s biggest fossil fuel importer.】

item.title: 资本集团和库什纳的 Thrive 公司来华考察人工智能领域
item.description: 约书亚-库什纳（Joshua Kushner）的茁壮资本（Thrive Capital）和投资公司 Capital Group 最近几个月访问了中国，了解中国的人工智能产业，在 DeepSeek 的进展震惊硅谷之后，越来越多的美国投资者重新燃起了对中国的兴趣。【原文：Joshua Kushner’s Thrive Capital and investment firm Capital Group have in recent months visited China to learn about its AI industry, joining a growing number of US investors rekindling interest in the country after DeepSeek’s advances stunned Silicon Valley.】

item.title: 印度股市看涨势头暂停
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 农民抗旱，中国小麦收成恐创七年新低
item.description: 中国的小麦产量今年可能会下降多达 5%，达到 2018 年以来的最低水平，因为近期主要产区的干旱给作物带来了压力。【原文：China’s wheat output could drop as much as 5% this year to the lowest since 2018, after recent drought in key growing regions stressed the crop.】

item.title: 墨西哥将要求美国政府豁免钢铁关税
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长周二表示，墨西哥将在本周请求唐纳德-特朗普政府豁免将钢铁关税上调至 50%。【原文：Mexico will ask Donald Trump’s administration this week to be exempted from an increase in steel tariffs to 50%, the country’s economy minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济疲软为进一步降息提供依据
item.description: 由于公共需求和出口都不利于经济增长，澳大利亚经济在 2025 年的开局表现逊于预期，这也加强了储备银行采取鸽派立场并进一步放宽政策的理由。【原文：Australia’s economy opened 2025 on a softer-than-expected note as both public demand and exports detracted from growth, reinforcing the case for the Reserve Bank to act on its dovish stance and ease policy further.】

item.title: 嘉鲁达航空公司称正与印尼财富基金商谈 5 亿美元融资事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）正在与该国主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）商谈注资约5亿美元的事宜，因为这家陷入困境的国家航空公司正寻求扭转业务颓势。【原文：PT Garuda Indonesia is in talks with the country’s sovereign wealth fund Danantara about an injection of around $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter, as the struggling national carrier looks to turn its business around.】

item.title: 老虎管理公司校友斯诺迪将发起日本参与基金
item.description: 大卫-斯诺迪（David Snoddy）在成立自己的公司之前，曾负责管理老虎管理公司（Tiger Management）的东京办事处，他计划在下个月推出一只日本股票基金，重点关注现金流强劲、资产负债表稳健和现金过剩的公司。【原文：David Snoddy, who ran the Tokyo office of Tiger Management before setting up his own firm, plans to launch a Japanese stock fund next month that focuses on companies with strong cash flows, solid balance sheets and excess cash.】

item.title: 阿波罗呼吁澳大利亚制定 "量身定制 "的私人市场规则
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management, Inc）警告澳大利亚证券监管机构不要对非上市投资制定 "一刀切 "的规则，并呼吁监管应针对特定的资产类别。【原文：Apollo Global Management, Inc. has warned Australia’s securities regulator against “broad brush” rules for unlisted investments and has called for regulation to instead target specific asset classes.】

item.title: 中国最高外交官敦促美国将中美关系纳入 "正轨
item.description: 中国外交部长王毅在与美国新任驻华大使珀杜（David Perdue）的首次会晤中抱怨了华盛顿最近采取的行动，凸显了世界两大经济体之间关系的低迷。【原文：Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi used his first meeting with new US Ambassador David Perdue to complain about recent actions by Washington, underscoring a downturn in relations between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 新加坡 CDL 出售 21 亿美元办公大楼以削减债务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，城市发展有限公司（City Developments Ltd.）同意出售其在新加坡最具标志性的办公楼群之一的多数股权，因为该开发商在家族争斗之后正寻求减少债务并重拾投资者的信心。【原文：City Developments Ltd. agreed to sell its majority stake in one of Singapore’s most iconic office complexes, according to a person familiar with the matter, as the developer seeks to reduce debt and regain investor confidence after a family feud rocked the firm.】

item.title: 全球基金权衡印尼市场反弹是否过快
item.description: 印尼金融市场在经历了几个月的崎岖后出现反弹，引发了关于反弹能否持续的讨论。【原文：Indonesia’s financial markets have bounced back after a torrid few months, sparking a debate on whether the rally can last.】

item.title: 美国就业数据抑制避险需求，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于美国职位空缺意外增加，提振了风险情绪，帮助美元走强，黄金在上一交易日下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after falling in the previous session due to an unexpected increase in US job openings, which buoyed risk-on sentiment and helped strengthen the dollar.】

item.title: 丰田汽车股价因收购折扣反弹而下跌
item.description: 在丰田集团公布了一项 4.7 万亿日元（约合 330 亿美元）的丰田产业公司私有化计划后，丰田产业公司股价创下九个月来最大跌幅，招致投资者和分析师的猛烈抨击，称该计划严重低估了丰田产业公司的价值。【原文：Toyota Industries Corp. shares fell the most in nine months after the Toyota group unveiled a ¥4.7 trillion ($33 billion) plan to privatize Toyota Industries Corp., drawing sharp criticism from investors and analysts who say the proposal significantly undervalues the company.】

item.title: 李明博赢得大选后韩国股市和韩元上涨
item.description: 由于李在明在总统大选中获胜，结束了长达数月的政治领导真空，韩国股市和韩元上涨。【原文：South Korean stocks and won gained, as Lee Jae-myung’s widely-expected win in the presidential election ended a months-long political leadership vacuum.】

item.title: 孟加拉塔卡将受大选和关税影响继续下滑，BMI 称
item.description: 根据惠誉解决方案公司旗下的 BMI 的数据，由于南亚国家潜在的政治不稳定和美国关税的增加，孟加拉国塔卡今年的跌幅将扩大。【原文：The Bangladesh taka is set to extend this year’s decline due to potential political instability in the South Asian country and the increase in US tariffs, according to BMI, a unit of Fitch Solutions.】

item.title: 贝恩乘势而上，维珍澳大利亚 IPO 目标 4.43 亿美元
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）控制的维珍澳大利亚航空公司将以6.85亿澳元（约合4.43亿美元）的首次公开募股价格重新上市，押注投资者将一扫美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战带来的动荡。【原文：Bain Capital-controlled airline Virgin Australia will relist in a A$685 million ($443 million) initial public offering, betting investors are brushing off the turmoil caused by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 关注美国库存和加拿大野火，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于一个美国行业组织发出了全国原油库存下降的信号，而且降雨减缓了导致加拿大生产停顿的一些大火的蔓延，石油价格在连续两天上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after two days of gains as a US industry group signaled a decline in nationwide crude inventories and rain slowed the growth of some blazes that had shut in Canadian production.】

item.title: 与特朗普挂钩的 "真相社交比特币 ETF "在提交申请后渐行渐近
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.似乎离推出与比特币挂钩的交易所交易基金更近了一步，加入了为散户提供加密货币投资产品的拥挤行列。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. appears to be one step closer to launching an exchange-traded fund tied to Bitcoin, joining the crowded field of crypto-investment offerings for the retail masses.】

item.title: 央行完全有理由继续在黄金市场买入黄金
item.description:
在过去三年中，各国央行和主权财富基金购买黄金的速度翻了一番。他们只是没有申报而已。【原文：

Central banks and sovereign wealth funds doubled the pace of their gold purchases in the past three years. They just aren’t declaring them.

】
